text: This is a complete list of the stage and broadcast works of the Swiss composer Heinrich Sutermeister (1910–1995). Sutermeister was notable as a pioneer of radio and television opera. He composed three works for radio and three for television, as well as eight conventional operas, a monodrama and a ballet. ==List== {| class="wikitable sortable"
